name: Black Russian
description: Black Russian is an 80/20 indica-dominant strain bred by Delicious Seeds, who created this strain by crossing a Black Domina mother with White Russian. Notes of mango and citrus collide with lemon candy to create a medley of sweet tropical aromas that burst from Black Russian’s compact buds. This indica is known for her potency and endurance, making Black Russian the perfect choice for either patients seeking long-lasting symptom relief or anyone in need of deep relaxation of both mind and body.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Sleepy, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Fatigue, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid
